help-file.title: "CLONE FORM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Self Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Illusion
This is a more powerful version of mask allowing the caster to take on the appearance of ANY mob or player in the room. Anyone with detect illusion has a chance to see that this is an illusion
syntax: cast 'clone' victim name in room -to change your appearance cast 'clone' self or me -to remove the illusion
